pageContext.claim: “And I will also say -- you're talking about the vast majority -- I don't mean like 51 percent; I mean like 88 percent, 93 percent.  I've seen numbers.  They're all with you. [They support ICE.]”
pageContext.analysis: There a limited number of polls looking specifically at Americans support for ICE. Trump appears to be referring to a Morning Consult/ Politico poll that found 54 percent of Americans support ICE. The Fact Checker found no additional polls referencing higher rates of support.
